review:
As this is men's watch but I like this watch  
N sonata range is awesome

Good Looking better performance.

This is for children's

Excellent watch loved it . I suggest everyone to buy this .

The strap broke in a couple days, I cannot figure out how to turn off the
alarm, so I just set it to a later time than the 5 a.m. time it was set at,
and I cannot figure out how to turn off the hourly chime. Was there a manual
with this? I don't think so.

The watch is well built.....  
I liked it very much...  
The major con is that I can't see the time in black when i look at it in
Direct Sunlight...  
Thts all

Received the watch properly packed and on time. I had purchased this watch as
a gift to a teenage family friend... a collegian. He loved the watch at the
first instance! Easily readable monitor, big digits, stop watch function,
bright back light and host of other functions. The jet back color and smooth
finish gives a premium feel. It can be worn even in office on a Saturday! I
was tempted to keep the watch for myself ;) It looks good on all wrist sizes.
Reasonably priced, good features, warranty protection and robust to survive
few knocks. The collegian was very happy and my money was well spent. Thank
you Amazon!

value for money.

sweet and simple with perfect water resistance

Well, I don't have to say much because Tata/Sonata speaks for itself.  
Worth every penny I spent for.

title: PERFECT VALUE FOR MONEY SPORTS WATCH
Great pick by me
Five Stars
A very good watch with enough feature at low cost..
Good product at affordable price
Five Stars
Best at this price!Best brand
Excellent watch
like 12hr/24 hr format
Five Stars
review:
First of all I got this fabulous watch for effective price of ₹375/-  
Box contents:  
1.A cardboard cylinderical box with metal caps  
2.A sonata sf watch  
3.quick manual  
4.warrenty card  
5.product card  
This is a TATA product sold under brand name sonata superfibre watches.  
Perfact watch for gym workout and sport activity as the watch is only 50 gm in
weight that there is no stress around wrist if watch would being long time
worn.  
The entire dial made of plastic with stainless steel back and buttons. The
strap is rigid black fibre which is non allergic to skin .  
The watch has four buttons:  
1.light  
2.date  
3.mode  
4.alarm  
  
There are some reviews stated the watch for kids but this watch can be used by
adults also.  
Effectively visible provided information with extra light illumination for
night time use.  
  
Then the information or features of this watch:  
1\. Time in hh:mm:ss in 12hr as well as 24 hr formet  
2\. Present Day  
3\. Date  
4\. Alarm function with repeatation if desirable.  
5\. stopwatch  
6\. Hourly reminder  
  
The build quality of watch is outstanding as compare to cheap chinese watches.  
It is water resistant up to 30 M.  
Comes with 6 months of brand warrenty againts manufacturers defects.  
So overall value for money product with accurate time,outstanding features and
trusted company.



 Fully satisfied.. even if your hands are lean it suits well



 Very nice watch.......

Best watch at this price...good product..  
At least we get a brand watch at that price...a nice good looking product with
a low cost. Good feature like stopwatch, alarm ,24&12 hr(AM,PM)
date,day.......thanx amazon thanx sonata.....

Great quality, sturdy and robust. Time is somewhat invisible under direct
light but manageable. Warranty written is 1 year but on warranty card only 6
months is mentioned. Why so? Display will feel small for the people with wider
wrist, for which try other models of Super fibre series.

Beautiful and strong. Used 5 months and i am very satisfied.

Really a good product..Sonata is a good brand.I had been using Sonata watches
for last 2 years.Now I purchased these one..the product is great.. BUILD
MATERIAL IS VERY GOOD..You may see images..  
Amazon is great..as always!

Great watch, slim, very light weight ....  
Nice fitting and pretty tough .....  
Ideal for students and commuters....

Checked water resistancy in glass of water for 5 minutes.Working ok.  
Had to search answers but  
All the features are there,like  
12hr/24 hr format,  
Hourly chime,  
Canceling hourly chime,  
Light 💡,  
Day,  
But Date in mm, dd format,  
Alarm is also but not for every 5 minute.s/10 minutes etc.  
Have gifted one to my nephew and one to my son both are happy.  
Cloudtail is gaining my trust on them more and more day by day.

"Watch is really good" but the Currier packaging was low quality..

review:
Fabulous watch



A good product from Sonata at reasonable price, and delivery before expected
time by Amazon was pleasing. Quality seems good and user friendly dial design,
looks trendy on wrist, a must one for joggers. Multiple alarm settings would
have been an extra function, if it has been introduced. Hourly chime inbuilt
function is good for keeping time track. Overall, good one.

I buy for my son (9) Diwali gift  
Amazon send before date only  
He is so happy  
Nice watch good colour working perfectly  
Thank you Amazon

title: Bst product
Best watch for kids
Five Stars
SONATA Name is enought for Watches !!
GO FOR IT. NYC PRODUCT FOR BOYS ONLY.
You can't expect a better digital watch in 400 bucks
If it were a person, I would marry it!
Five Stars
Good and Trusted product by Sonata(TATA Product)
Nice watch for the price
review:
Nyc watch for school or college students

I orderd it for my little brother as a birthday gift.He loved the watch.The
alarm is loud.Best watch for kids



Bought it just for 263/- and Of course This one is awesome !!!



I don't know why people are not giving it a five star...You can't expect a
better digital watch in 400 bucks...

I've bought this same model from sonata in two different colors. It'll easily
last you for at least 2 years even if you wear it 24/7!  
Great product! Absolutely sturdy.  
Shows day-of-week on screen & date is just a push of a button away!  
The alarm feature is useful as a backup to your main alarm in case of ultra-
important reasons!  
The stopwatch is cool if you want to time your runs!  
  
All in all, this is a great product & I would be pretty happy to get it for
500/-  
(I bought it for 400 both the times)  
If you're a student or young professional & choose functionality over form,
this product will not disappoint you.  
Looks pretty cool to!

Nice watch I liked it

Good Product.  
I personally use Fossil watches which counts in Premium watches. But for a
gift purpose I buy this product.  
To be honest, Everything is good in this watch in such a amazing price of
Rs399.  
What else can one expect in such a range.  
one must to have this for causal trip like trekking or biking, Even I bought
one for me as well.

Can't complain for the price this watch sells. Still looks classy especially
the black one. One of my friends called it's price to 1500-2000 bucks by
seeing this watch. Nice one go for it, just the black one. Others look cheap.
